main.name: Santiago Sanchez Restrepo
main.secondText: a passionate Front-End Web Developer from Colombia with over 2 years of experience working with technologies such as...

aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.text: I am an enthusiastic developer with two years of experience in the world of web development. My journey in Front-End development began with a deep fascination for how web technologies can transform user experiences. Since then, I have been immersed in continuous exploration and learning. In my career, I have had the opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies, including blockchain. I have integrated Next.js with Solana and used Web3Auth to develop a points system application, thus expanding my experience in web3 solutions. My goal is to become an expert in creating attractive and highly functional web interfaces.
